languages.text: "{name}... ты же понимаешь, слушая откровения этого ксеноса, что твой экипаж и корабль ждут долгие, долгие, очень долгие проверки и чистки..."
"{name}... you do realise, listening to this xenos's revelations, that your crew and ship are in for a long — very long — investigation and purge..."
languages.original_text: "{name}... ты же понимаешь, слушая откровения этого ксеноса, что твой экипаж и корабль ждут долгие, долгие, очень долгие проверки и чистки..."

traits.locale_text: "{name}... you do realise, listening to this xenos's revelations, that your crew and ship are in for a long — very long — investigation and purge..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "{name}... you do realise, listening to this xenos's revelations, that your crew and ship are in for a long — very long — investigation and purge..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「{name}さん…この異種族の暴露話を聞いて気付かれましたよね。御身のクルーと船は長い…とても長い…調査と処分を受けることになるでしょう…」
languages.original_text: "{name}... you do realise, listening to this xenos's revelations, that your crew and ship are in for a long — very long — investigation and purge..."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}さん…この異種族の暴露話を聞いて気付かれましたよね。御身のクルーと船は長い…とても長い…調査と処分を受けることになるでしょう…」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “{name}……你要明白，如果你真的聆听这个异形的洗脑，你的船员和这艘飞船恐怕会在接下来的很长、很长的一段时间，面临各种各样的调查与清洗……”
languages.original_text: "{name}... you do realise, listening to this xenos's revelations, that your crew and ship are in for a long — very long — investigation and purge..."

traits.locale_text: “{name}……你要明白，如果你真的聆听这个异形的洗脑，你的船员和这艘飞船恐怕会在接下来的很长、很长的一段时间，面临各种各样的调查与清洗……”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « {name}... J'espère que vous réalisez qu'au vu des révélations de ce xénos, votre équipage et votre vaisseau vont faire l'objet d'une très, très longue enquête ainsi que d'une purge... »
languages.original_text: "{name}... you do realise, listening to this xenos's revelations, that your crew and ship are in for a long — very long — investigation and purge..."

traits.locale_text: « {name}... J’espère que vous réalisez qu'au vu des révélations de ce xénos, votre équipage et votre vaisseau vont faire l'objet d'une très, très longue enquête ainsi que d'une purge... »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «{name}... ¿se da cuenta de que, al escuchar el testimonio de este xenos, a su tripulación y su nave les aguardan una investigación extensísima y su consecuente purga?».
languages.original_text: "{name}... you do realise, listening to this xenos's revelations, that your crew and ship are in for a long — very long — investigation and purge..."

traits.locale_text: «{name}... ¿se da cuenta de que, al escuchar el testimonio de este xenos, a su tripulación y su nave les aguardan una investigación extensísima y su consecuente purga?».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "{name} ... ist Euch angesichts der Enthüllungen dieses Xenos klar, dass Eurer Crew und Eurem Schiff eine lange – sehr lange – Untersuchung und Säuberung bevorsteht ..."
languages.original_text: "{name}... you do realise, listening to this xenos's revelations, that your crew and ship are in for a long — very long — investigation and purge..."

traits.locale_text: "{name} ... ist Euch angesichts der Enthüllungen dieses Xenos klar, dass Eurer Crew und Eurem Schiff eine lange – sehr lange – Untersuchung und Säuberung bevorsteht ..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "{name}. Bu zenonun anlattıklarından sonra fark etmişsindir: Mürettebatının ve geminin uzun, çok uzun bir incelemeden ve arındırılmadan geçmesi gerek."
languages.original_text: "{name}... you do realise, listening to this xenos's revelations, that your crew and ship are in for a long — very long — investigation and purge..."
